page.title: 10LEISURE PURSUITS
page.content: There are lots of things to do in {Cudworth}in your spare time. At the park there are{swings and slides}for the little children. People can play {Crown Green Bowls}or just watch; there is a big open space for ball games and there is also a{swimming pool}and a {learner pool.}You can visit the {amusement arcade}and play{Space {Invaders}or you can go to one of the {pubs}for a quiet{drink}with your friends.{Children}can join{Scouts, {Guides, Cubs, Brownies}or the {Majorettes.}Many people join the {Library;}there are 4122 members. if you want a{suntan}you can use the {sunbed}at the DIY shop.
